post.summary: Removes a user from a Slack channel.
post.description: This function removes a specified user from a given Slack channel. It takes the channel ID and user ID as required parameters and returns a response indicating whether the operation was successful. This method is useful for managing channel membership programmatically.

ai.systemPrompt: Requires `channelId` (starts with 'C') and `userId` (starts with 'U') to remove a user from a channel. Use `listChannels` and `searchUserByEmail` if necessary.

body.description: Body of the removeUserFromChannel sls call

channelId.description: The ID of the channel to remove the user from. Channel IDs start with 'C'.

userId.description: The ID of the user to remove. User IDs start with 'U'.

ok.description: Indicates if the request was successful.
